articles.title: Crypto Brain Drain Is "Absolutely Crazy" In India, Says Polygon Co-Founder - NDTV Profit
articles.description: India's dithering on whether to embrace digital assets is causing thousands of developers, investors and entrepreneurs to leave for places with more friendly regulation, according to the co-founder of the country's most famous crypto startup.
articles.content:
